data.description: Interaction with the iTunes Music Store
data.communities: personal website under projects, possibly perlmonks.org
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I chose the Net::* namespace because the iTunes Music Store (iTMS)
    is interacted with over the internet via HTTP and HTTPS requests.
    There are currently no other modules (known to me) that provide
    similar functionality. Net::iTMS and the related modules included
    deal with the encryption, decompressing, and extraction of data to
    provide a solid base for other developers to use.
